title: Permanent ban
body: I got a permanent baa on an account, yeah i get it i was toxic, which is rare for me as i am toxic occasionally when i get really triggered. However i understand i may deserve this as i was toxic, however i have spent over £1100 on this game... which for some people is a considerable sum of money, i have had my account for 5 years and this is a lot for me. once again i understand i was toxic, however this has been an account accumulated for years and it is now gone. £1100 down the drain, is there nothing that can be done at all...

replies.body: If the account was banned for toxicity, there is nothing that can be done, no. Accounts that are properly banned (i.e. the vast majority of them) are *never* unbanned.

Why would Riot unban someone who has demonstrated to be toxic?
You haven't reformed.
And if you have: [Prove It](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/MuEzWfvq-mordius-i-can-change-challenge-2018)
Nope. All that rented, digital property is no longer usable, permanently. Gotta learn to control your frustration buddy, good luck.
Make a support ticket and plead your case. (Long shot, but your only shot.)

Honestly, if you spent that much on a game, you probably should be worried about more than being banned from it..

It takes a lot of work to get banned, though. You had plenty of time to reconsider.

The amount of money nor the amount of time you spent on that account will matter. If you ever make a new account ask yourself this question: "Is flaming this stranger worth more than the account that I've invested so much into?" Personally, I'd rather keep my account clean than to risk losing it because I was angry at someone that I would mostly never meet in real life. Sorry but your account is gone forever :(
Nothing. It's not even your account, it's Riot's.
